titles: By the King. A proclamation for the discovery of rebells invading the county of Glocester, and for the apprehending of spies and intelligencers.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,
notes: With royal coat of arms at head of document.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford this fourteenth of January, in the nineteenth year of Our Reigne.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Gloucestershire (England) --  History --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
